- Added anonymous usage statistics for pet types, database types, and active skills to help improve the plugin (b8cf3c414)
- Added automatic backup of corrupted pet data instead of losing it entirely (876f2bc28)
- (1.21.4+) Fix console error when capturing a Wandering Trader (eebcf6f8c)
- (1.21.9+) Fix console error when capturing a Zombie Villager (3366cb196)
- (1.21.4+) Fix console error when Pets have potion effects with no visible color (a0ba0ab7b)
- (1.21.11+) Fix player client crash when capturing an angry Bee (9fa75c5a0)
- (1.21.11+) Fix player client crash when capturing an angry Wolf (c6d3ca249)
- Fix Pet Shop failing to open when a Pet egg icon position exceeds Minecraft's inventory size limit (b2d571952)
- Fix console error when a skilltree contains an unrecognized skill name - now logs a warning instead (7f9daa837)
- Fix auto-updater failing to update from older MyPet versions (2b340a4de)
- Fix Pet and player data potentially being lost when the server shuts down (1d56d8ca9, 5d482a4d1)
- Fix console error when loading Pets for a player who disconnected during login (e20d48901)
- Fix console error when a player disconnects immediately after clicking "Yes" in the Pet Shop confirmation (b367c4e6f)
- Fix console error when a player disconnects while purchasing from a Pet Shop (5b43b81c)
- (Snapshot fix) Standardize bStats data collection so that differing capitalization doesn't affect the charts (eg MYSQL vs MySQL vs mysql) (2a1a3d685)
